title: Heartbreak High’s inclusiveness goes global
brief_description: In this video, LGBTIQA+ flags are overlayed on Heartbreak High characters to signal their sexual identities. With over 1M views, it speaks to the popularity of the show but also the importance of representation on TV. Until the 1990s, it was uncommon to find queer characters on screen, so audiences had to do things like search for subtext or create fanfiction. Heartbreak High’s sexually (and culturally) diverse characters reflect contemporary society and the evolution of screen representation, while easy-to-use video and social media tools let fans create shareable content that celebrates diversity and connects like-minded people around the world.
description:
This video features in a responsive display in the museum that presents the moments, stories and memes capturing the zeitgeist by going viral on the internet.

In this video, LGBTIQA+ flags are overlaid on Heartbreak High characters to signal their sexual identities. With over 1M views, it speaks to the popularity of the show but also the importance of representation on TV. Until the 1990s, it was uncommon to find queer characters on screen, so audiences had to do things like search for subtext or create fanfiction. Heartbreak High’s sexually (and culturally) diverse characters reflect contemporary society and the evolution of screen representation, while easy-to-use video and social media tools let fans create shareable content that celebrates diversity and connects like-minded people around the world.
